Class AppViewManager

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.copakond.sweetfluffysheep.view.utils.AppViewManager
public class AppViewManager extends Object
AppViewManager is a singleton class that manages the main application view, including the canvas, overlay, and background video. It handles user interactions, settings, and switching between different frames.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static void init(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Initializes the AppViewManager singleton instance with the given stage. This method should be called only once at the start of the application.
      Parameters:
      stage - The primary stage of the application.

    • get

      public static AppViewManager get()
      Returns the singleton instance of AppViewManager.
      Returns:
      The AppViewManager instance.

    • getScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()
      Returns the canvas used for drawing.
      Returns:
      The canvas.

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
      Returns the overlay pane used for displaying frames.
      Returns:
      The overlay pane.

    • setFullScreen

      public void setFullScreen(boolean fullScreen)
      Sets the full-screen mode for the application.
      Parameters:
      fullScreen - true to enable full-screen mode, false to disable it.

    • setClickListener

      public void setClickListener(IClickListener listener)
      Sets the click listener for handling mouse clicks.
      Parameters:
      listener - The click listener to set.

    • setProfilesPath

      public static void setProfilesPath(String path)

    • setTexturesPath

      public static void setTexturesPath(String path)

    • openSettings

      public void openSettings()
      Opens the settings dialog for adjusting application settings. This includes music volume, SFX volume, FPS, and fullscreen mode.

    • initSettings

      public static void initSettings(String profilesPath)
      Initializes the application settings from a JSON file. This method reads the settings from the specified path and applies them to the application.
      Parameters:
      profilesPath - The path to the profiles' directory.

    • update

      public void update()
      Update the canvas size and redraw the current frame. Used to refresh the canvas when the scene is resized.

    • playBackgroundVideo

      public static void playBackgroundVideo()
      Preloads the background video for smoother playback. This method should be called before playing the video.

    • stopBackgroundVideo

      public static void stopBackgroundVideo()
      Stops the background video playback. This method should be called when the video is no longer needed.

    • resizeBackgroundVideo

      public void resizeBackgroundVideo()
      Resizes the background video to fit the canvas dimensions. This method is called to ensure the video covers the entire canvas area.

    • switchTo

      public void switchTo(javafx.scene.layout.Pane newFrame)
      Switches to a new frame and updates the canvas size. This method is used to change the current view displayed in the overlay.
      Parameters:
      newFrame - The new frame to switch to.
